title: Design Matters from the Archive: Tiffany Shlain
description: On this episode, Debbie talks to Tiffany Shlain about her films, about starting the Webby Awards, and about the growing presence of technology in our lives.
itunes:subtitle: On this episode, Debbie talks to Tiffany Shlain about her films, about starting the Webby Awards, and about the growing presence of technology in our lives.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
